metadata.author: Jen Bubbles
metadata.title: Unfinished Story.
metadata.outline: Frank is getting to big for his boots. Sue is offended.

elements.value: Sue and Frank have been mortal enemies for many years.
angry
I don't like you Frank. You've always been mean to me.
angry
Well, you're always mean to me too!

elements.action: Sue decides to stop being mean to Frank first.

elements.value: Explaining how you feel lets other people understand how their actions are effecting you.
happy
You've stopped being mean to me. This is better. Let's be friends!
happy
Yay! Why didn't we do this sooner?!
And everyone lived happile ever after.
upset
Ouch!
angry
Well you started it!
Being mean just because someone did it first doesn't make it right!
Frank and Sue got into a fight.
angry
Stop fighting you two. You both have detention!
Sue and Frank stayed enemies throughout high school, even though they could've become friends if they had just learnt to get along.

elements.action: Time travel and make Sue forgive Frank

elements.value: Well done, you've discovered time travel and healed a friendship.

elements.action: Time travel and make Sue destroy Frank

elements.value: Sue spends the rest of her life regretting her decision from a parallel dimension.
